name: Tower Defender (MKuper)
description:
This was a tower defense game I made as part of group for my Game Engines and Game Logic courses at Centennial College. They were both coding oriented courses where each of needed script a part of the game.

Credits:

Marko Kuper - Level Design,  Audio, Coding For Enemies and Win/Lose Conditions

Ethan Melo - UI Design and Functionality for Game Level, Coding For Towers, Economy, and Buildings

Melrose Porras - UI Art, Coding for Menu Navigation
